We recently estimated that 15·6 million (uncertainty interval [UI] 10·2–23·7 million) people inject drugs.
1 The estimated global prevalence of HIV infection among people who currently inject drugs is 18% (UI 11–25), and more than half are hepatitis C virus (HCV) antibody positive (52%, UI 42–62).
1 Recent years have seen HIV outbreaks and persistently high HCV incidence among people who inject drugs (PWID) in a range of settings. 2, 3, 4
